alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascade Foothills; South Washington Cascades (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 22 at 6:54AM PST until February 24 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...South Washington Cascades and South Washington Cascade Foothills. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. Those planning to venture outdoors should use common sense and dress warmly, making sure that all exposed skin is covered.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: South Washington Cascade Foothills; South Washington Cascades
